alameda_api/v1alpha1/datahub/metadata.proto

Top

This file has messages related to Kubernetes metadata

NamespacedName

Represents kubernetes resource with namespace and name

FieldTypeLabelDescription
namespace string

name string

alameda_api/v1alpha1/datahub/metric.proto

Top

This file has messages related to metric data of containers, pods, and nodes

ContainerMetric

Represents metric data of a container

FieldTypeLabelDescription
name string

metric_data MetricData repeated

MetricData

Represents a piece of metreic data

FieldTypeLabelDescription
metric_type MetricType

data Sample repeated

data can be time series or non-time series

NodeMetric

Represents metric data of a node

FieldTypeLabelDescription
name string

metric_data MetricData repeated

PodMetric

Represents metric data of a pod

FieldTypeLabelDescription
namespaced_name NamespacedName

container_metrics ContainerMetric repeated

Sample

Represents a data point of time-series metric data

FieldTypeLabelDescription
time google.protobuf.Timestamp

num_value string

TimeRange

Represents a time range definition

FieldTypeLabelDescription
start_time google.protobuf.Timestamp

end_time google.protobuf.Timestamp

step google.protobuf.Duration

MetricType

Metric type. A metric may be either CPU or memory.

NameNumberDescription
UNDEFINED 0

CPU_USAGE_SECONDS_PERCENTAGE 1

MEMORY_USAGE_BYTES 2

FieldTypeLabelDescription

alameda_api/v1alpha1/datahub/predict.proto

Top

This file has messages related to predictions of containers, pods, and nodes

ContainerPrediction

Represents a list of predicted metric data of a container

FieldTypeLabelDescription
name string

predicted_raw_data MetricData repeated

NodePrediction

Represents a list of predicted metric data of a node

FieldTypeLabelDescription
name string

predicted_raw_data MetricData repeated

is_scheduled bool

PodPrediction

Represents a list of predicted metrics data of a pod

FieldTypeLabelDescription
namespaced_name NamespacedName

container_predictions ContainerPrediction repeated

RecommendationPolicy

Recommendation policy. A policy may be either stable or compact.

NameNumberDescription
RECOMMENDATIONPOLICY_UNDEFINED 0

STABLE 1

COMPACT 2

alameda_api/v1alpha1/datahub/recommendation.proto

Top

This file has messages related to recommendations of containers, pods, and nodes

AssignPodPolicy

Represents a recommended pod-to-node assignment (i.e. pod placement)

FieldTypeLabelDescription
time google.protobuf.Timestamp

node_priority NodePriority

node_selector Selector

node_name string

ContainerRecommendation

Represents a resource configuration recommendation

It includes recommended limits and requests for the initial stage (a container which is just started) and after the initial stage

FieldTypeLabelDescription
name string

limit_recommendations MetricData repeated

request_recommendations MetricData repeated

initial_limit_recommendations MetricData repeated

initial_request_recommendations MetricData repeated

PodRecommendation

Represents a set of container resource configuration recommenations of a pod

FieldTypeLabelDescription
namespaced_name NamespacedName

apply_recommendation_now bool

assign_pod_policy AssignPodPolicy

container_recommendations ContainerRecommendation repeated

start_time google.protobuf.Timestamp

end_time google.protobuf.Timestamp

top_controller TopController

recommendation_id string

alameda_api/v1alpha1/datahub/resource.proto

Top

This file has messages related to compute resources

Capacity

Represents the capacity of a Kubernetes node

FieldTypeLabelDescription
cpu_cores int64

memory_bytes int64

netwotk_megabits_per_second int64

Container

Represents a container and its containing limit and requeset configurations

FieldTypeLabelDescription
name string

limit_resource MetricData repeated

request_resource MetricData repeated

Node

Represents a Kubernetes node

FieldTypeLabelDescription
name string

capacity Capacity

Pod

Represents a Kubernetes pod

FieldTypeLabelDescription
namespaced_name NamespacedName

resource_link string

containers Container repeated

is_alameda bool

alameda_scaler NamespacedName

node_name string

start_time google.protobuf.Timestamp

policy RecommendationPolicy

top_controller TopController

used_recommendation_id string

TopController

Represents top controller of the pod

FieldTypeLabelDescription
namespaced_name NamespacedName

kind Kind

Kind

Represents kubernetes resource kind

NameNumberDescription
POD 0

DEPLOYMENT 1

DEPLOYMENTCONFIG 2

ALAMEDASCALER 3

alameda_api/v1alpha1/datahub/score.proto

Top

This file has messages and services related to Containers.ai

SimulatedSchedulingScore

Represents a system score before and after pod scheduled on node

FieldTypeLabelDescription
time google.protobuf.Timestamp

score_before float

score_after float

alameda_api/v1alpha1/datahub/server.proto

Top

This file has messages and services related to Federator.ai

CreateAlamedaNodesRequest

Represents a request for adding nodes that need to be predicted

FieldTypeLabelDescription
alameda_nodes Node repeated

CreateNodePredictionsRequest

Represents a request for creating predictions of a node metric data

FieldTypeLabelDescription
node_predictions NodePrediction repeated

CreatePodPredictionsRequest

Represents a request for creating predictions of containers' metric data belonging to a pod

FieldTypeLabelDescription
pod_predictions PodPrediction repeated

CreatePodRecommendationsRequest

Represents a request for creating a pod's recommendation

FieldTypeLabelDescription
pod_recommendations PodRecommendation repeated

CreatePodsRequest

Represents a request for creating pods

FieldTypeLabelDescription
pods Pod repeated

CreateSimulatedSchedulingScoresRequest

Represents a request for adding scheduling scores produced by ai engine

FieldTypeLabelDescription
scores SimulatedSchedulingScore repeated

DeleteAlamedaNodesRequest

Represents a request for stoping predicting nodes

FieldTypeLabelDescription
alameda_nodes Node repeated

DeletePodsRequest

Represents a request for deleting pods data

FieldTypeLabelDescription
pods Pod repeated

QueryCondition

FieldTypeLabelDescription

limit uint64

QueryCondition.Order

NameNumberDescription
ASC 0

DESC 1

DatahubService

Service for providing data stored in the backend

Method NameRequest TypeResponse TypeDescription

Used to list pod metric data
ListNodeMetrics ListNodeMetricsRequest ListNodeMetricsResponse

Used to list node metric data

Used to list pods need to be predicted

Used to list nodes need to be predicted

Used to list nodes' information

Used to list pod predictions

Used to list node predictions
ListPodRecommendations ListPodRecommendationsRequest ListPodRecommendationsResponse

Used to list pod recommenations

Used to list pods by a node name
ListSimulatedSchedulingScores ListSimulatedSchedulingScoresRequest ListSimulatedSchedulingScoresResponse

Used to list system scores

Used to add pods that need to be predicted

Used to add nodes that need to be predicted

Used to create predictions of pods
CreateNodePredictions CreateNodePredictionsRequest .google.rpc.Status

Used to create predictions of nodes
CreatePodRecommendations CreatePodRecommendationsRequest .google.rpc.Status

Used to create recommendations of pods
CreateSimulatedSchedulingScores CreateSimulatedSchedulingScoresRequest .google.rpc.Status

Used to create scores of system
DeletePods DeletePodsRequest .google.rpc.Status

Used to delete info of pods
DeleteAlamedaNodes DeleteAlamedaNodesRequest .google.rpc.Status

Used to stop generating predictions for the nodes

Scalar Value Types

.proto TypeNotesC++ TypeJava TypePython Type
double double double float
float float float float
int32 Uses variable-length encoding. Inefficient for encoding negative numbers if your field is likely to have negative values, use sint32 instead. int32 int int
int64 Uses variable-length encoding. Inefficient for encoding negative numbers if your field is likely to have negative values, use sint64 instead. int64 long int/long
uint32 Uses variable-length encoding. uint32 int int/long
uint64 Uses variable-length encoding. uint64 long int/long
sint32 Uses variable-length encoding. Signed int value. These more efficiently encode negative numbers than regular int32s. int32 int int
sint64 Uses variable-length encoding. Signed int value. These more efficiently encode negative numbers than regular int64s. int64 long int/long
fixed32 Always four bytes. More efficient than uint32 if values are often greater than 2^28. uint32 int int
fixed64 Always eight bytes. More efficient than uint64 if values are often greater than 2^56. uint64 long int/long
sfixed32 Always four bytes. int32 int int
sfixed64 Always eight bytes. int64 long int/long
bool bool boolean boolean
string A string must always contain UTF-8 encoded or 7-bit ASCII text. string String str/unicode
bytes May contain any arbitrary sequence of bytes. string ByteString str
